DOC.brief_summary: This single-institution prospective randomize clinical trial perform Gynecologic Oncology clinic Ankara University . Patients endometrial cancer cervix cancer operate stag via laparoscopic approach include study . The included patient randomize two group surgery . During operation first group instrument advance bipolar energy use lymphadenectomy hysterectomy salpingo-oophorectomy . In second group operation perform conventional bipolar energy forceps . The outcome parameter measure intra-operative bleeding , duration operation , intraoperative complication , postoperative pain score , postoperative complication , postoperative duration hospitalization , late complication lymphocele formation cost .
DOC.brief_title: The Comparison Conventional Advanced Bipolar Energy Modalities During Laparoscopic Staging Surgery Gynecologic Cancers
DOC.criteria: Pathologic diagnosis endometrial cervix cancer Stage I , IB1 , IIA1 cervix cancer patient partial complete response chemoradiotherapy Clinically stage I II endometrial cancer Hematologic abnormality Coagulation disorder Present past thromboembolic disease ECOG performance > 2 Advanced stage disease Fertility preserving surgery
